description.p: Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 1, and your Strength or Dexterity also score increases by 1.
Age. Beastkin mature a little faster than humans, reaching adulthood around age 14. They age noticeably faster and rarely live longer than 50 years.
Alignment. Beastkin who live in groups tend to have a similar disposition. When alone their alignments differ based on their circumstances.
Size. Your size is medium, anywhere beteen 4-6 feet tall depending on species.
Speed. Your speed is 30ft.
Creature Type. You are Humanoid and Beast.
Beast Sense. You can detect the location of all living creatures within 30ft as if you can see them.
Animal Instincts. You gain proficiency in 2 of Perception, Animal Handling, Survival, Nature, or Insight.
Speak with Beasts. You can communicate with neutral and friendly animals using sounds and gestures. Animals can only handle basic concepts and are not under your control.

Tireless. You have the energy of a beast within you. You require little sleep, and you are always generally aware of what goes on around you when you do sleep. When asleep you get to roll perception to detect attacks and you only need to sleep 4 hours a night.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Commonand one other language of your choice.
You can detect the location of all living creatures within 30ft as if you can see them.

sheet.description: You can detect the location of all living creatures within 30ft as if you can see them.

description.p: You gain proficiency in 2 of Perception, Animal Handling, Survival, Nature, or Insight.
You can communicate with neutral and friendly animals using sounds and gestures. Animals can only handle basic concepts and are not under your control.

sheet.description: You can communicate with neutral and friendly animals using sounds and gestures. Animals can only handle basic concepts and are not under your control.

description.p: You have the energy of a beast within you. You require little sleep, and you are always generally aware of what goes on around you when you do sleep. When asleep you get to roll perception to detect attacks and you only need to sleep 4 hours a night.

sheet.description: You require little sleep, and you are always generally aware of what goes on around you when you do sleep. When asleep you get to roll perception to detect attacks and you only need to sleep 4 hours a night.

description.p: HERE
Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 1.
Tough Skin. You gain +1 AC and resistance to cold.
You gain +1 AC and resistance to cold.

sheet.description: You gain +1 AC and resistance to cold.

description.p: HERE
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity or Intelligence score increases by 1.
Jackrabbit. Your walking speed increases by 5.

Overlooked. Lapines are fast and it is hard to take them seriously in a fight, opponents who would get an attack of opportunity against them must pass a dc 12 wisdom save or be unable to make the attack. This means they do not lose the reaction but cannot make said action against the Lapine.

Lapines are fast and it is hard to take them seriously in a fight, opponents who would get an attack of opportunity against them must pass a dc 12 wisdom save or be unable to make the attack. This means they do not lose the reaction but cannot make said action against the Lapine.

sheet.description: Lapines are fast and it is hard to take them seriously in a fight, opponents who would get an attack of opportunity against them must pass a dc 12 wisdom save or be unable to make the attack. This means they do not lose the reaction but cannot make said action against the Lapine.

description.p: HERE
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 90 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
Good Climber. You gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed as long as you are not wearing medium or heavy armor nor a shield. Otherwise you have a climbing speed of 10.
You gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed as long as you are not wearing medium or heavy armor nor a shield. Otherwise you have a climbing speed of 10.
HERE
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity or Wisdom score increases by 1.
Nimble Fox. Your walking speed increases by 5.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
Carrion Eater. You gain Resistance to poison and disease.
You gain Resistance to poison and disease.
HERE.

Ability Score Increase.You can increase two of following ability scores Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma by 1 and 2. You cannot increase the same score.
Nimble Fox. Your walking speed increases by 5.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
Foxfire.Due to your connection with magic and the fey ancestry, you are able to cast dancing lights at will. Your spellcasting ability for this spell is Charisma, and the dancing lights will always appear as a blue flame.
Tailed Beast.All kitsune have at least 1 tail. As kitsune grow in power so too do the number of tails. You gain a tail at levels 3, 5, 8, 11, 13, 15, 18, and 20.
Masked Form.As an action, you can assume the appearance of a specific human form of the same sex. This form is the same every time the ability is used. If someone wants to see your kitsune form, they must actively succeed on an Investigation or Perception check with a DC 10 + your Deception Modifier.
Kitsune retain their beastkin abilities.
Beast Sense. You can detect the location of all living creatures within 30ft as if you can see them.
Animal Instincts. You gain proficiency in 2 of Perception, Animal Handling, Survival, Nature, or Insight.
Speak with Beasts. You can communicate with neutral and friendly animals using sounds and gestures. Animals can only handle basic concepts and are not under your control.

Tireless. You have the energy of a beast within you. You require little sleep, and you are always generally aware of what goes on around you when you do sleep. When asleep you get to roll perception to detect attacks and you only need to sleep 4 hours a night.

Due to your connection with magic and the fey ancestry, you are able to cast dancing lights at will. Your spellcasting ability for this spell is Charisma, and the dancing lights will always appear as a blue flame.

sheet.description: You are able to cast dancing lights at will. Your spellcasting ability for this spell is Charisma, and the dancing lights will always appear as a blue flame.

description.p: All kitsune have at least 1 tail. As kitsune grow in power so too do the number of tails. You gain a tail at levels 3, 5, 8, 11, 13, 15, 18, and 20.

sheet.description: All kitsune have at least 1 tail and increase as you gain in power. Your {{kitsune:tails}} tails give a hint to your power.

description.p: As an action, you can assume the appearance of a specific human form of the same sex. This form is the same every time the ability is used. If someone wants to see your kitsune form, they must actively succeed on an Investigation or Perception check with a DC 10 + your Deception Modifier.

sheet.description: As an action, you can assume the appearance of a specific human form of the same sex. This form is the same every time the ability is used. If someone wants to see your kitsune form, they must actively succeed on an Investigation or Perception check DC {{dc:masked form}}.

description.p: HERE
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity or Charisma score increases by 1.
Danger Sense. Your tail gives you insight into danger. When faced with an enemy or situation that is dangerous to you, your tail will stiffen based on how deadly the situation.
Your tail gives you insight into danger. When faced with an enemy or situation that is dangerous to you, your tail will stiffen based on how deadly the situation.

sheet.description: Your tail gives you insight into danger. When faced with an enemy or situation that is dangerous to you, your tail will stiffen based on how deadly the situation.

description.p: HERE
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength or Dexterity score increases by 1.
Pack Tactics. You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

sheet.description: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
